item.title: Algo walkthrough: swapping elements to find max score
item.description: Initial setup The initial setup consists of an unsorted array. Each element has a score defined as the absolute value of the difference the element’s value and its index. The absolute value The metric for each element gives us a sense of displacement. For example, if an element at index `4` is of value `10` the score for this is `6`. If the element was at index `5` and of value `11`, the score is still `6`.
